Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Al Cason in Padova, you'll be minutes from Giardini dell'Arena and Scrovegni Chapel. This hotel is within close proximity of Zuckermann Palace and Eremitani Town Museums.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge).

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Al Cason, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is 11 AM
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Hotel Al Cason, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Giardini dell'Arena - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Scrovegni Chapel - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Zuckermann Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Eremitani Town Museums - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Church of the Eremitani - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Piazza dei Signori - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Museo del Risorgimento e Dell' eta Contemporanea - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Loggia della Gran Guardia - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Pedrocchi Cafe - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Palazzo della Ragione - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Padova Trade Fair - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
University of Padova - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Piazza delle Erbe - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Padua Cathedral - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Palazzo del Monte di Pieta - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Al Cason is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 37.6 km / 23.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
